ReviewList.Text: It reviews existing battery technologies, physics involved, clearly explains the main differences between IC engines and electric motors, which I have not thought about. It also provides cost estimates, provides for the various components required and useful advice about other things to consider more in the practical side.
The book spent alot of time discussing politics and not how to build an electric car
Dates and format of the book was confusing. Some times the book taked about years as they were in the future. Other times they would mention the same year as being past.

There is good information here, but it is buried in a lot of anecdotes and filler that appear to be about making the book bigger.  If you want to find out what's possible, this book will help, but if you are looking for a nuts and bolts breakdown, there are better resources available that will get to the point a lot sooner.

This is a work that never ends.  That is, it needs to be updated at least every two years in order to keep up with the commercial technology.  Tesla model S is significantly more capable than the technology described, not only in the car, but also in the roadside charging station infrastructure.
I got the book yesterday so I can't stop to read , its look in great condition with many picture on it I think this is going to be really great book , helping me on my project.
A lot of caption mistakes on the photos. Pretty much a rehash of the previous 2 editions. Not up to date on the latest technology.
I was really pleased with this book.  It has a lot of information to consider about electric vehicles.

It is very inspiring. Without this information in the hands of the general public we have no hope for an EV future. The public needs to have the facts in order to effect change. If not we will be dependent on foreign fuel and all the negative impacts that it entails.
this book should be a news paper article it give no new info and just steals your money. do not read or buy

This is a well written book about the people and the challenges behind prize.  It weaves the personal stories and motivations of those involved and gives insight into what it takes to achieve your goals.
